```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

alc <- read_csv("alcohol_cleaning_data.csv")
health_board <- st_read("../raw_data/SG_NHS_HealthBoards_2019/SG_NHS_HealthBoards_2019.shp", quiet = TRUE)

head(health_board)
  
```
```{r}
health_board_simply <- simplify(health_board)
head(health_board_simply)
```
```{r}
plot(health_board_simply)
```
```{r}
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
library(rgeos)
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
```
```{r}
country_scotland<- world %>% 
  filter(name == "United Kingdom")
```
```{r}
ggplot(country_scotland) +
  geom_sf() +
  ggtitle(country_scotland$name)
```
